Duration: 2 hours

With this ticket to the Summit One Vanderbilt, youâ€™ll see futuristic digital shows inside one of New Yorkâ€™s newest skyscrapers. Youâ€™ll also take in views of Manhattan from a height of 1214 feet.

As you explore three levels of multi-sensory galleries inside the skyscraper, youâ€™ll see digital art installations by internationally acclaimed artists and designers. Youâ€™ll see works inspired by stories, optical illusions and interactivity. Youâ€™ll also see the busy streets below the building during the â€˜Levitationâ€™ experience, which involves standing on a transparent platform over 984 feet above the ground.

When you reach the SUMMIT Terrace, you can see New Yorkâ€™s skyline and views for up to 80 miles. You can also order cocktails and light fare from CafÃ© AprÃ¨s.

## Why Visit

- Three floors of multi-sensory immersive experiences at the top of a skyscraper
- Panoramic views of New York and landmarks like the Empire State Building
- Futuristic observation deck that combines elements of art and technology

## What's included

- Admission
- Levitation experience

## What's Not Included

What's not included

- Ascent experience
- Food and drinks

### Restrictions

- Comfortable footwear is recommended.


### Additional information

Please note that all Summit tickets are timed. Please arrive at your scheduled time, which is indicated on your ticket.

The Summit operates at full capacity. You might not be able to get in if arriving more than 20 minutes after the time indicated on your ticket.

Any late arrival is subject to availability and a rescheduling fee

Children aged 0â€“5 years can join for free.

Please note that some rooms and installations have mirrored floors. Please dress comfortably and in accordance with the tour. Trousers, shorts or tights are recommended. Sunglasses are recommended for day visits. Note that stiletto heels, steel-toe boots and any footwear that could cause damage to the mirrored floors are not allowed on this tour.

### Frequently asked questions

#### How do I book a ticket?

- Select a date and time.

- Choose the number of tickets.

- Click to the next page and enter your personal details.

- After entering your personal details, select your payment method and enter your payment details.

- Once youâ€™ve entered your payment details, youâ€™ll be redirected to the ticket page where you can check the status and details of your reservations.

- You'll receive a confirmation email once the reservation is confirmed with the attraction operator. This could take some time depending on the supplier.

- You can view your tickets in the confirmation email or in the Bookings & Trips section of your account.


* * *

#### When do I pay?

Booking.com collects payment on behalf of the attraction operator when you book your ticket.

* * *

#### How do digital tickets work?

Each digital ticket contains a unique code. This is usually a QR or numerical code, but could be something else and can be found on your ticket or the PDF sent to you.

If your digital ticket contains a barcode or QR code, show it to the staff at the attraction's entrance or ticket collection point for them to scan.

For those with numerical codes, show your ticket to staff for verification.

* * *

#### Can I cancel or modify my tickets?

Youâ€™ll need to check the policy on the specific ticket you book. Last-minute bookings might not have free cancellation available.

* * *

#### When will I get my free cancellation refund?

After you cancel, we'll issue a full refund immediately. Depending on your bank or payment provider, it can take 3â€“10 days to be refunded to your original payment method.

json.Attraction_name: SUMMIT One Vanderbilt Tickets in newyork
Why visit: Three floors of multi-sensory immersive experiences at the top of a skyscraper
Panoramic views of New York and landmarks like the Empire State Building
Futuristic observation deck that combines elements of art and technology
additional Information: All Summit tickets are timed. Please arrive at your scheduled time, which is indicated on your ticket.
The Summit operates at full capacity. You might not be able to get in if arriving more than 20 minutes after the time indicated on your ticket.
Any late arrival is subject to availability and a rescheduling fee.
Children aged 0â€“5 years can join for free.

Some rooms and installations have mirrored floors. Dress comfortably and in accordance with the tour. Trousers, shorts or tights are recommended. Sunglasses are recommended for day visits. Stiletto heels, steel-toe boots and any footwear that could cause damage to the mirrored floors are not allowed on this tour.
